30 
31 // Microsoft Facilty codes when building a HRESTULT go up to 81, so we'll just start at 128
32 // we have 11 bits to work with giving us a max value of 2047
33 #define DIRTYAPI_SOCKET (128)
34 #define DIRTYAPI_PROTO_HTTP (129)
35 #define DIRTYAPI_PROTO_SSL (130)
36 #define DIRTYAPI_QOS (131)
37 #define DIRTYAPI_MAX (2047)
38 
39 /*** Macros ***********************************************************************/
40 
41 /*** Type Definitions *************************************************************/
